newsitem.title: INDIA: Yield on Indian 364-day t-bill at 8.55 pct.
newsitem.headline: Yield on Indian 364-day t-bill at 8.55 pct.

text.p: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) said it set a cut-off rate of 92.14 rupees at its auction of 364-day treasury bills on Wednesday.
Dealers said the yield worked out to 8.55 percent.
The RBI said it received 76 bids for 19.85 billion rupees of which it accepted 37 for 11.30 billion rupees, at a cut-off price of 92.14 rupees.
The deveolvement on primary dealers amounted to 490 million rupees and the total face value of bills issued was 11.79 billion rupees, RBI said.
The weighted average cut-off was 92.18 rupees.
